before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"c4i18","text":"Store the reagents separately from RNA/TNA (total nucleic acid) samples. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"68ucu","text":"Use a clean designated work area and separate pipettes for pre- and post-extraction steps to minimize the potential for cross-contamination ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d515f","text":"Wear a lab coat and protective eyewear. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e51du","text":"Wear gloves and change them often.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7cf6u","text":"Prevent contamination by using aerosol-resistant pipette tips. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ft4h0","text":"This protocol uses the Ceres Nanotrap® particle-based virus capture and concentration method for 10mL of wastewater followed by extraction with the Zymo Environ™ Water RNA extraction kit with a Zymo DNase step. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"a3ugt","text":"When developing this protocol, we extracted at least 2 replicates of each wastewater sample to ensure we had ample RNA for downstream processes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"99lta","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4drdt","text":"RNA extraction is performed at room temperature and centrifugation at 10,000-16,000 x g for 30s ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
